creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: seven lines of expressive, widely spaced characters written with a thin brush; some characters are smaller and thinner than others; red rectangular intaglio stamp URC; lighter red, circular relief seal LLC
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio seal; LLC, circular relief seal; on back, URC, in pencil: [Kono Tetto]
title: Poem
